name: Jacque Strappe Lager
description: Jacque Strappe lager is a refreshing light and crisp North American style lager. It is a beer ideal for a bold athlete like Jacque after a game of pond ice hockey. Served ice cold. Crisp, clean and oh so refreshing.

name: Steam Whistle Pilsner
description: Canada’s Premium Pilsner is the award winning beer from Steam Whistle. With over 20 years of brewing, this quality product proudly stands as Canada’s #1 Craft Beer!

name: Tropical Stout
description: Stout made with toasted coconut, Pandan and milk sugar. This stout is milk chocolate and coconut up front with hints of vanilla throughout and finishes with a touch of earthy nuttiness.

name: XXXXX Stout
description: Pike XXXXX Stout boasts a full-bodied, velvety malt texture featuring hints of chocolate, licorice, and dark roasted coffee. Robust with a gorgeous reddish-black color and a rich mouthfeel, the secret to Pike XXXXX Stout’s cult-like following is a generous hop blend that brings a complexity of flavors without overwhelming the malt character.
